professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Administrator with expertise in database management, ETL processes, and system optimization.

key_responsibilities: Provided full lifecycle support for SQL Server across Premier customers.
Managed critical issues from identification to resolution and documentation.
Developed and implemented SSIS packages for data extraction
transformation
and loading.
Administered SQL Server platforms from 7.0 to 2005.
Collaborated with application development groups for security management and change control procedures.
Designed SSIS packages for data migration.
Administered and optimized SQL Server databases in a high-security environment.
Performed regular backups
recovery testing
and performance tuning.
Led database administration tasks for multiple systems.
Assisted with disaster recovery planning and data archiving.
Administered large-scale databases in a high-availability environment.
Monitored and resolved performance issues to maintain system uptime.
Supported database needs for multiple applications and departments.
Performed regular maintenance
backup
and recovery operations.
Developed and maintained databases for various applications.
Collaborated with IT on database design and performance optimization.
